pullrequest.title: patch for issue #1167, where pr2 screw joint is misbehaving (it's simply drifting).

content.raw:
I mentioned that I wanted more explanation about how to ensure that the test runs long enough for the joint to wrap and to document the analytical velocity calculation a bit better. I took a crack at this in branch issue_1167_scpeters (31cdeee). Please consider merging that in.

EDIT: I added another commit to the branch (c5da50d)
content.html:
I mentioned that I wanted more explanation about how to ensure that the test runs long enough for the joint to wrap and to document the analytical velocity calculation a bit better. I took a crack at this in branch issue_1167_scpeters (31cdeee). Please consider merging that in.

EDIT: I added another commit to the branch (c5da50d)
